I am a Biologist and M.Sc. Bioinformatics from the [Universidad Nacional de Colombia](https://unal.edu.co/). Currently I am a PhD student at the Department of Plant Biology at [SLU](https://www.slu.se/), working in [Dr. Hafrén's lab](https://andershafren.wixsite.com/website) on in Plant-Virus Molecular interactions. My Ph.D. research focuses on how plant viruses manipulate *Arabidopsis thaliana's* post-transcriptional regulatory mechanisms, including RNA interference machinery, Stress granules, and Translational regulation.
